enb_long_title: Eleventh Session of The INC for the Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
sentences: The drafting group submitted: 'The COP should endeavour not to hold such a session at a time which would make the attendance of a significant number of delegations difficult.
' There was no agreement on placement (in paragraph 2 or in a footnote).
After Saudi Arabia tried to reinstate language on sacred religious holidays, delegates agreed to retain the compromise text in paragraph 2.
